name: OrcinUS: Pod Rescue
description:
Your pod has been captured by a cruel marine park - only you can rescue all the orcas to reunite your family!

SWIM FOREVER

In this "Endless Swimmer" game, you play an orca swimming through the ocean, catching fish and avoiding dangers. The simple one-touch controls are easy for anyone to learn!

EXPLORE VIBRANT BIOMES

Your journey starts in a beautiful coral reef, but the quest to save your pod from cruel SlamWharf will bring you across the seas. Discover new food (and dangers) as you progress on your missions.

RESCUE YOUR POD

Unlock 4 unique playable orcas - each has different skills, swimming stats, and personality traits. Bring your family together!

COMPLETE CHALLENGES

Through dozens of unique missions, master the seas to level up your character and unlock new sights. The challenge doesn't stop there - several stats are also tracked for each swim, so you can always increase your high scores.

UNLOCK COOL POWERUPS

Grab powerups from helpful bubbles to slow time, gain lives, shatter obstacles, and more! Catch 6 fish in a row and your orca will gain a special boost. Plus, as you level up, additional powerups become available, so there's always more to explore.
